column6:
Hi ya'll! My place is a beautiful, brand new home in a safe, tranquil, and newly developed neighborhood. It is within a 20-25 minute drive of Austin's most popular attractions. 

Downtown (~18 min drive)
The University of Texas at Austin (~15 min drive)
The Domain (~20 min drive)
Zilker Park/Town Lake (~20 min drive)
Circuit of the Americas (~20 min drive)
Austin-Bergstrom Airport (~20 min drive)

My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
column9: Brand new modern, one story, cozy 3 bdrm house
